mapper.select: select utensilname from recipe r, recipeutensil ru , utensil u where r.recipeno= ru.recipeno and ru.utensilno= u.utensilno and r.recipeno=#{recipeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into recipeutensil(recipeno, utensilno) values(RECIPE_RECIPENO_SEQ.CURRVAL,(select utensilno from utensil where utensilname=#{utensilName}))
mapper.update: update book_ex.RecipeUtensil set utensilNO = #{utensilNO}, utensilName = #{utensilName}, where RECIPENO = #{recipeNO}
mapper.select: select i.ingredienttype, i.ingredientname, i.bestbefore, i.efficacy, i.price from recipe r, ingredient i, recipeingre ri where r.recipeno=ri.recipeno and ri.ingredientno= i.ingredientno and r.recipeno=#{recipeno}
mapper.insert: insert into recipeingre(recipeno, ingredientno, amount, required) values(#{recipeNo}, (select ingredientno from ingredient where ingredientname=#{ingredientName}), #{amount}, #{required})
mapper.update: update book_ex.RecipeIngre set ingredientNo = #{ingredientNo}, amount = #{amount}, required = #{required}, where RECIPENO = #{RECIPENO}
